alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 1:27PM MST until February 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
